name: Flag For Freedom
description:
Flag For Freedom, or "FFF----"

Remade from my Global Game Jam 2016 game, "In The Hands of The People". I kinda just sat on it for the last year and the politics of 2017 just brought it back. Created in the two weeks from 1/5/2017 to 1/19/2017. A short game about where we just might be headed and how we got into this mess.

On the eve of Presidential Power Day, the President himself has tasked you with imbuing your Patriot Star with Patriot Power! Wave it and wack it back and forth with loving strokes to raise that flag! That's all that matters! What will happen when the flag reaches the top? Only you will find out!

Controls:

Mouse movement
